mapper.select: select * from Plan where user_id=#{user_id} and plan_date < #{plan_date} order by plan_date asc
select * from Plan where user_id=#{user_id} and plan_date >= #{plan_date} order by plan_date asc
select * from Plan where user_id=#{user_id} and plan_date like '%${plan_date}%'
mapper.insert: insert into Plan(user_id, plan_content, plan_date,plan_start_time, plan_end_time, plan_if_repeat, plan_if_finish) values (#{user_id}, #{plan_content},#{plan_date},#{plan_start_time}, #{plan_end_time}, #{plan_if_repeat}, #{plan_if_finish})
mapper.delete: delete from Plan where plan_id = #{plan_id} and user_id = #{user_id}
